eligibility_text: Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related technical field.
Students with a passion for web development and a good understanding of frontend technologies.
Students with good typing speed and proficiency in MS Excel.
Currently pursuing a Master's or PhD in Computer Science, with a focus on AI/ML.
Basic knowledge of web technologies required.
Good communication skills and enthusiasm for marketing.
Basic Android development knowledge preferred.
Commerce background preferred.
Portfolio showcasing design skills required.
Good understanding of Python programming.
Good writing skills in English.
Electronics engineering students preferred.
Basic knowledge of data analysis tools.
Knowledge of full stack development.
Interest in financial technology.
Familiarity with cloud computing concepts and AWS services.
Creative portfolio required.
Good communication and problem-solving skills.
Active on social media platforms.
Good programming knowledge and teaching aptitude.
Pursuing a degree in Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
Basic web development knowledge.
Basic computer knowledge required.
Strong understanding of UI design principles and React.
Knowledge of database management systems.
Creative portfolio showcasing design work.
Enrolled in a Computer Engineering or Electrical Engineering program.
Commerce or finance background preferred.
Attention to detail and testing mindset.
Students in their penultimate year of a degree in Finance, Economics, or a related field.
